pullRequest.title: SO-4039 query expression labeler API
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR adds a QL/ECL expression labeler request to the available SNOMED CT Java API.
By default expands FSNs in a given query expression for all available concept IDs, but can be configured to use preferred terms and different locales.

commit.message: SO-4039: initial implementation of query labeler request

nodes.bodyText: The fact that this builder only accepts the literals SnomedConcept.Expand.FULLY_SPECIFIED_NAME or SnomedConcept.Expand.SYNONYM should be documented somewhere - users of this request might think that it works with a type SCTID.

commit.message: SO-4039: add a TermStringConverter to strip off pipes from concept terms
SO-4039: fix failed ETL parsing test cases
